phrases: Send the lost promises to the stars
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
The scars that were left behind will not go away
The Fujiwara Bros, Charisma in the World of Architecture
A Melee at the Party Hall!?
As tall and as loud as they are...
And with the outfits they are sporting...
Even after they returned, it is been pretty crazy...
The talks really went all the way from there...
We will officially announce the splitting for the Tottori and Tokyo teams.
Please forgive how selfish we are being, and...
Well, I bet the current A Team and B Team will split up between Tokyo and Tottori, but...
I would like to let Tanaka-san, the newlywed, stay in Tokyo...
I do not want to leave my family behind!
In that case, one member from Tokyo team will automatically get sent to Tottori...
I am a little cold, will you please hold me?
Mayama, where did you go last night?
I am going to the storage, so if you have anything you want to put away, please take it out.
What are you ignoring me for?
I will not fall for your provocations.
Actually, we already know everything due to Asai-san's fax.
It is not that easy to escape from our twisted maze of love.
But it looks like Asai-san will be out for a while.
If Asai-san ends up retiring like this...
I still have my ambition of someday working with her.
I would like her to continue, no matter how.
But for that, she will need a replacement for Asai-san.
Although it is a risky bet...
Every year, when everyone is finishing up their preparations for the Hamabi Festival, the flu goes around.
He does not seem to have a cold, but...
In that case, it will be fine.
Takemoto is not the only one acting funny at this time of the year.
The graduate thesis and the job hunting...
A time like that comes for every senior.
That we finished all the jobs that had been asked of Harada Design?
Because she knew that you would get worried.
I told her that maybe she should ask you to come back, but she will not listen.
I felt really at ease when I was with him.
I mean, he does not know about Harada-kun.
He does not know about my past.
That is why when I was with him, I did not have to pretend that I would gotten over it.
I could concentrate on my work without worrying about anything else.
And all the while, that boy just quietly stood by my side.
I think that I was truly being saved by him.
Ever since that accident, she is been blaming herself.
If she feels any amount of fun or joy,
she is immediately overcome with guilt and pushes those things away from her.
Mayama-kun, you might just be one of those things that she pushed away.
Exactly what blaming yourself and pushing everything away, I wonder...
I could not say anything to her, I only wanted to see her.
So I struggled tremendously and desperately...
The pain which tears my heart apart just thinking about it...
That this pain is enough reason for me not to distance myself from her.
A lot of information has leaked out already, but as of this December, Fujiwara Design will split into two.
The teams will be split according to the board.
Mario-san, please hold on a second!
Mayama is not staying in Tokyo?
I know it is selfish of us.
But I promise you that he will be treated well.
What is it at a time like this, Leader?
Have all the complicated talks ended?
It is time to say goodbye.
Hey, are you okay with that?
That he is quitting so suddenly?
It is certainly a green spring.
But it will get a little lonely.
No, no, is not it said that you should make your precious child travel?
How can both of you be so calm about it?
Could it be that I am being left out of the group?
Can I bring out the desk that I was using before?
You can just treat me as a temporary employee at first.
I am pushing myself onto you, after all.
But if you think that I am useful, please employ me here.
Well, it is just how things went.
May I borrow these two monitors?
I will go make some coffee.
Please have some while it is hot.
Did not I tell you when I left this place?
That I will come back, even if you are not waiting?
I already said this at the hospital, but I will say it again.
Please employ me at Harada Design.
I should be more useful than I was before.
I will end up hurting you again...
It is okay, you can hurt me.
Because I will not be hurt.
In a sweet and endless melody.
But I gently cover her ears.
That is why I came back to this place.
Oh, I am so glad it is sunny.
Having the ceremony in your hometown is the best.
It is in your neighborhood, so everyone can come.
My, my, look at how nervous Tat-chan looks.
And compared to him, just look at how composed the bride is.
But it sure has been a while since a youngster from the Hamadayama Shopping District got married.
This is such a joyous occasion!
I am so happy for you!
Now everyone, it is celebration sake!
We made the right choice to go with white.
It certainly is a wonderful outfit.
But I wonder if it is okay for me to be wearing white when this is my second wedding?
There is no second or fifth time for a joyous occasion.
You are going to keep working at the bar, right?
You should make a lot of requests from your husband now.
And of course, when you do, order from my store.
T-The bride's eyes just shined suspiciously!
Their family has held a firm grip on the wallets, hearts and secrets of the men of the Hamadayama Shopping District for 52 years.
They intend on squeezing even more money out of us!
It is great that we got the first groom out of the Third Generation Association, but...
So it is Tatsukichi from the sushi restaurant...
They are probably going to start conning us into ordering expensive sushi now for the rest of our lives...
I am really happy for you.
I am happy, but a little... l-l-lonely...
Now see here, Ayu, Tatsu-san is mine now.
You should not touch him so easily anymore.
Hey now, Ayu, how many drinks have you had?
This girl is the biggest problem.
It is also problematic that she does not realize it.
Now, now, do not cry, Tatsukichi-san.
It will be all your fault, Ayu, if the Hamadayama Shopping District goes extinct after the third generation.
I have always cared about Ayu!
I will not let you have Ayu, she is mine!
Ayu, do not be depressed about failed love for too long.
Switch your mindset and start looking for a new man and a new job.
Do not be causing problems for your parents for long either.
But in this day and age, there are not that many good men or good jobs.
Well, if you really run out of a place to go, come to my place.
We can start Misuzu Store No. 2.
The bride's eyes just shined suspiciously!
The night before the Hamabi Festival
He made a tall object, that is for sure...
I wonder if this was done on purpose?
It looks as if it is about to collapse, but it is not collapsing.
He has great techniques, but he is a little lacking in the creativity department...
He is a serious, hard-working student... but how should we judge this work?
There are so many displays this year, are not there?
Sign: The Tower of Adolescence Takemoto Yuuta
The lack of planning, yet the stoicism that I sense in it...!
It really makes me reminisce about those days when I was so confused as well!
Those days when I kept struggling and striving, even though I did not even know who I was!
I just could not hold back anymore.
Y-You finished the one from the other day already?
You have been coming around a lot lately...
Well then, what should I get tonight?
I want to deposit your pay, so can you give me your account number and cell phone number?
Moreover, for things like that, if you could just go through Mayama like usual...
You had not heard yet that Mayama quit, Yamada-san?
I wonder what happened to Yamada-senpai?
It looks like she is burned out...
I hear she passed out at her store last night.
W-What in the world happened to her?
Let us just leave her be for now...
The Holy Sanctuary of Crepeshhhhhhh The Last Supper
objet = curio; a novel, possibly bizarre art object
I need to talk to you!
You were proposed to by four guys at once?
Well, I do not know what to say...
And so you ran away from them, Yamada-san?
But the four are all older guys from the shopping district that you have been friends with from long ago, right?
Is not there anyone among them that you think is kind of nice?
I-I mean... we have always been together since we were little, and t-they have always been so nice...
I-I just never thought of them like that...
Why does it turn out like this?
We have always been friends and things were going great...
Why do they need to say something like that now?
If they did not tell me that they liked me, we could have been friends forever...
Yamada-san already knew how everyone felt.
No matter how many times you get angry at me, I probably will not change.
Why did you have to fall in love with me?
I see, so you heard about Mayama...
I would always thought that Mayama was an idiot and a jerk.
I wondered, why cannot he like me when I have liked him so much for so long?
If the guys from the shopping district pressed me, Why are not we good enough, when we like you so much?
If they said, We have liked you for so long, you need to choose one of us.
What would you do if they said that?
They are really precious to me!
But I cannot ever do that.
This is how Mayama must have felt... that is why...
It would be a lot quicker if you just found another man.
What should I say to everyone?
Do I need to tell everyone now, what I hated to have myself told?
You can only keep trying or give up.
These are the only two choices we humans ever have.
All you can do is to tell them your honest feelings.
The rest is up to them.
To keep trying, or to give up.
Then it will be their turn to choose.
Was not it the same for you?
It is the same for everyone.
I lied about one thing to Yamada-san.
But a path will open up easier when you believe that there are only two choices.
I will not mention the third choice.
Taken advantage of by his smiling face
kuchi ni shita sake ni aorarete, oh
Stimulated by the alcohol she drank
The tear that wells up when she is shown otherwise
ki ga sukkari sono ki ni natteru
She would already become all for it
Even if she tries to pretend that it was a dream
His paper tells a different story
The silvery summer's night she was picked up on
She is being constricted by a mistake that will not go away
Next episode: I do not even know my own feelings.
